vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.44
§ Keros = "ankle"
head of a family of temple slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基綠 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "踝"
跟隨所羅巴伯歸回的聖殿殿役，家族領袖之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基绿 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "踝"
跟随所罗巴伯归回的圣殿殿役，家族领袖之一
